sentences.en: Members of parliament approved the move by a majority of ninety-nine.
sentences.cn: 国会议员们以99票的多数批准了该提案。

sentences.en: Ninety-nine percent of primary pupils now have hands-on experience of computers.
sentences.cn: 99%的小学生如今都有电脑实际操作经验。

sentences.en: Why are there still approximately ninety-nine female secretaries for every one male?
sentences.cn: 为什么男女秘书的比例仍然约为1：99？
